We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Lanta
topLevelComment.text: What resources would you recommend me to get more advanced in design? Persomething like freeDesignCamp  haha

topLevelComment.author: dragonhunter250utub
topLevelComment.text: I think you should build some small javascript video games using a canvas, you'll get a huge benefit and js skills boost.

topLevelComment.author: dragonhunter250utub
topLevelComment.text: if you want to resize an image correctly you can use some js canvas methods, and an aspect ratio, check coding math channel, he have a very good video on how to resize an image correctly. This way you'll save a lot of time since you have lots of images.

topLevelComment.author: MoRizer
topLevelComment.text: Often taking a nap helps me solve problems
